name: OhmPlug
0:
”"Alexa, turn on the coffee maker"”
”"Alexa, are the porch lights on?"”
”"Alexa, turn on the fan in Carter's room."”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can control your appliances from anywhere with OhmPlug. This action allows you to control any appliance plugged into an OhmPlug with your voice using Amazon Echo. No more getting out of bed to turn off the lights. You can turn devices on and off by asking Alexa. You can make a plug-and-play smart home using OhmPlugs in traditional electrical outlets. Just download the OhmPlug app, use it to install your OhmPlugs, and connect it to your Amazon account in the Alexa app. You will also be able to view and control your smart plug-connected devices in the Alexa app.
